title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms market on strong trading day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.15%
       inched 0.60% higher to $398.90 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        -0.14%
       rising 0.29% to 4,864.60 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        -0.77%
       falling 0.25% to 37,905.45. Microsoft Corp. closed $1.72 short of its 52-week high ($400.62), which the company achieved on January 22nd. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        +0.53%
       rose 0.67% to $195.18, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +2.04%
       rose 0.66% to $148.68, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +2.15%
       rose 0.72% to $147.04. Trading volume (18.2 M) remained 7.8 million below its 50-day average volume of 26.0 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The March Consumer Confidence Index comes out Tuesday; an estimate of fourth-quarter GDP growth arrives Thursday; and the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation measure comes Friday.
